title: Fix CLI entry point export
description:
The icetype package CLI has broken import:
- packages/icetype/src/cli.ts imports from '@icetype/cli/dist/cli.js'
- This path is not exported in @icetype/cli package.json
Fix the export or import path
close_reason: Fixed CLI export path - added ./cli export to @icetype/cli

title: Add working examples
description:
Create examples/ directory with:
1. examples/basic-usage/ - Simple schema definition and validation
2. examples/iceberg-export/ - Export schema to Iceberg metadata
3. examples/typescript-codegen/ - Generate TypeScript types
Each should have README and runnable code

title: Fix minor code issues
description:
From code review:
1. Remove unused PACKAGE_JSON_ADDITIONS in init.ts
2. Fix hardcoded VERSION in cli.ts - read from package.json
3. Add noUnusedLocals/noUnusedParameters to tsconfig
4. Add explicit return types to async functions

title: Add adapter abstraction layer

Create packages/adapters with:
- SchemaAdapter interface
- AdapterRegistry class
- Move Iceberg/Parquet to adapter pattern
This enables future multi-backend support (ClickHouse, DuckDB, etc.)

title: Add ClickHouse adapter
description:
Create @icetype/clickhouse adapter:
- ClickHouseAdapter implementing SchemaAdapter
- Generate CREATE TABLE DDL from IceType schema
- Type mappings (IceType -> ClickHouse)
- Support for MergeTree engine family
- Partition by directive support

title: Add DuckDB adapter
description:
Create @icetype/duckdb adapter:
- DuckDBAdapter implementing SchemaAdapter
- Generate CREATE TABLE DDL from IceType schema
- Type mappings (IceType -> DuckDB)
- Support for Parquet file integration

title: TDD: Add tests for CLI validate command (0% coverage)
Add ice sqlite export CLI command
Epic: Schema Evolution & OLAP Projections
description: Core schema evolution system with support for OLTPâ†’OLAP denormalization projections. Enables tracking schema versions, generating migrations, and defining materialized/denormalized views for analytical systems.

title: Define SchemaVersion type and version comparison
description: RED: Write tests for SchemaVersion type with major.minor.patch versioning, comparison operators, and compatibility checks. GREEN: Implement SchemaVersion in @icetype/core.

title: Define Projection directive and types
description: RED: Write tests for $projection directive - marks schema as derived view, specifies source entities. GREEN: Implement ProjectionDefinition type and parser support for $projection, $from, $expand directives.

title: Implement relation expansion for OLAP schemas
description: RED: Write tests for expanding relations into flat columns - '-> User' becomes user_id, user_email, user_name columns. GREEN: Implement expandRelations(schema, depth, fieldSelector) function.

title: Generate denormalized Iceberg/Parquet schemas from projections
description: RED: Write tests for generating flattened Iceberg schemas from projection definitions. GREEN: Update IcebergAdapter to handle projections and generate wide denormalized tables.

title: Add ice migrate CLI command
description: RED: Write tests for 'ice migrate' CLI - generate migrations between schema versions, output for specific dialect. GREEN: Implement migrate command with --from, --to, --dialect options.

title: Add ice project CLI command for OLAP generation
description: RED: Write tests for 'ice project' CLI - generate denormalized schemas for OLAP targets from projection definitions. GREEN: Implement project command with --target (iceberg|clickhouse|duckdb) option.

title: Add schema history tracking file
description: RED: Write tests for schema history file (.icetype/history.json) that tracks schema versions over time. GREEN: Implement schema history persistence with timestamps, version numbers, and checksums.

title: Add migration rollback support
description: RED: Write tests for generating DOWN migrations alongside UP migrations. GREEN: Implement reverseMigration() that generates rollback operations for each migration type.

title: Implement schema diff detection
description: RED: Write tests for detecting schema changes - added fields, removed fields, renamed fields, type changes, modifier changes. GREEN: Implement SchemaDiff in @icetype/core that compares two IceTypeSchema instances.

title: Define Migration type and change operations
description: RED: Write tests for Migration type representing schema changes - AddField, RemoveField, RenameField, ChangeType, ChangeModifier operations. GREEN: Implement Migration types in @icetype/core.

title: Create @icetype/migrations package structure
description: RED: Write tests for migrations package API - generateMigration(from, to), applyMigration(migration, dialect). GREEN: Create packages/migrations with core migration generation logic.

title: Generate PostgreSQL ALTER TABLE migrations
description: RED: Write tests for PostgreSQL migration generation - ALTER TABLE ADD/DROP/RENAME COLUMN, ALTER TYPE. GREEN: Implement PostgresMigrationGenerator that produces valid PostgreSQL DDL from Migration objects.

title: Generate MySQL ALTER TABLE migrations
description: RED: Write tests for MySQL migration generation - ALTER TABLE ADD/DROP/MODIFY/CHANGE COLUMN. GREEN: Implement MySQLMigrationGenerator with MySQL-specific syntax.

title: Generate SQLite migration workarounds
description: RED: Write tests for SQLite migrations - SQLite has limited ALTER support, needs table recreation pattern. GREEN: Implement SQLiteMigrationGenerator with CREATE-COPY-DROP-RENAME pattern.

title: Generate ClickHouse ALTER TABLE migrations
description: RED: Write tests for ClickHouse migration generation - ALTER TABLE ADD/DROP/MODIFY/RENAME COLUMN with ClickHouse-specific syntax. GREEN: Implement ClickHouseMigrationGenerator.

title: Generate Iceberg schema evolution API calls
description: RED: Write tests for Iceberg schema evolution - addColumn, dropColumn, renameColumn, updateColumn using Iceberg's evolution API. GREEN: Implement IcebergEvolutionGenerator that produces Iceberg table update operations.

Epic: IceType Post-Review Improvements
description:
Comprehensive improvements based on 5 parallel reviews:
- General Code Review: 3 critical, 7 major, 12 minor issues
- Architectural Review: Missing adapter interface, package split needed
- Testing Review: Zero tests, ~4,050 lines recommended
- TypeScript Review: Unsafe assertions, missing strict flags
- Product/Vision Review: CLI stubbed, README overclaims

title: Critical Code Fixes
description:
Fix 3 critical issues from code review:
1. Unsafe UUID generation using Math.random instead of crypto
2. Missing error handling in file operations
3. Uncaught parse errors can crash CLI
close_reason: All child issues completed: UUID fix, error handling, parse errors

title: Fix UUID generation
description: Replace Math.random-based UUID with crypto.randomUUID() in packages/iceberg/src/metadata.ts

title: Add file operation error handling
description: Add try/catch and proper error messages for all file read/write operations in CLI commands

title: Handle parse errors gracefully
description: Ensure parser errors don't crash CLI - provide helpful error messages with line/column info
close_reason: ParseError class implemented with line/column info

title: CLI Schema Loading
description:
Implement proper schema file loading for CLI commands:
- Currently uses hardcoded example schemas
- Need to support .ts, .js, .json files
- Commands: generate, validate, iceberg export

description:

- Parser tests (tokenizer, type parsing, relation parsing)
- Validation tests (schema validation, error messages)

- CLI command tests
Target: ~4,050 lines of test code

Fix ClickHouse settings SQL injection vulnerability
Epic: Code Review Improvements
description: Issues identified from architectural, testing, TypeScript, and general code reviews for v0.1.0 hardening.

title: Extract serializeDDL to sql-common
description: RED: Write tests for generic serializeDDL(ddl, dialect) function. GREEN: Extract duplicated DDL serialization from mysql, sqlite, postgres, duckdb adapters into @icetype/sql-common. REFACTOR: Update all adapters to use shared implementation.

title: Add property-based testing for parser
description: RED: Add fast-check dependency. GREEN: Write property-based tests for parser - any valid identifier parses correctly, any valid type string parses correctly, round-trip parsing preserves data.

title: Improve CLI TypeScript UX - remove tsx requirement
description: RED: Write tests verifying CLI works with .ts files without global tsx. GREEN: Bundle esbuild or use jiti more comprehensively to transpile TypeScript schemas on-the-fly.

title: Decouple @icetype/adapters from @icetype/iceberg
description: RED: Write tests verifying adapters package only exports interfaces. GREEN: Move IcebergAdapter and ParquetAdapter implementations to @icetype/iceberg package. Keep only SchemaAdapter interface in adapters.

title: Add code coverage reporting with thresholds
description: RED: Configure vitest coverage with v8 provider. GREEN: Add coverage thresholds (80% lines, 75% branches). Add lcov reporter for CI integration. Update turbo.json to include coverage in test task.

title: Remove console.warn from library code
description: RED: Write tests verifying no console output in library code. GREEN: Replace console.warn in sqlite adapter with structured warnings returned in DDL result. Update adapter interface to support warnings array.

title: Add explicit return types to internal functions
description: RED: Enable noImplicitReturns in tsconfig. GREEN: Add explicit return type annotations to all public and internal functions that currently rely on inference.

title: Convert boolean type guards to narrowing predicates
description: RED: Write tests expecting type narrowing from guards. GREEN: Change isValidPrimitiveType(type: string): boolean to isValidPrimitiveType(type: string): type is PrimitiveType. Apply to similar functions.

title: Add foreign key DDL generation
description: RED: Write tests for FK constraint generation from relation fields. GREEN: Update SQL adapters to generate FOREIGN KEY constraints from -> relations. Handle ON DELETE/UPDATE actions.

title: Fix main icetype package exports pattern
description: RED: Write tests verifying package exports work with bundlers. GREEN: Replace node_modules path references in package.json exports with standard re-export pattern from index.ts.

title: Add database integration tests with testcontainers
description: RED: Write integration tests that verify generated DDL executes against real databases. GREEN: Use testcontainers for PostgreSQL, MySQL. Use in-memory for SQLite, DuckDB. Verify CREATE TABLE succeeds.

title: TDD: Extract shared SQL DDL utilities to @icetype/sql-common
Bundle tsx for native TypeScript schema file support
